items.name: merchant_id
items.title: Merchant ID
items.tooltip: Enter the Merchant ID provided by Quickpay. This is necessary to setup the integrations

items.name: payment_key
items.title: Payment Window Key
items.tooltip: Enter the Payment Window Key from Quickpay. This can be obtained under the Integration section of Quickpay

items.name: agreement_id
items.title: Payment Window Agreement ID
items.tooltip: Enter the Payment Window Agreement ID from Quickpay

items.name: apiuserkey
items.title: API User API Key
items.tooltip: Enter the API Key for the API User. This can be obtained under the Integration section of Quickpay

items.name: private_key
items.title: Private Key
items.tooltip: Enter the Private Key provided by Quickpay
